wireframe

Class Text

  • java.lang.Object
    • wireframe.AbstractElement
      • wireframe.AbstractWireframeElement
        • wireframe.Text
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Groupable

    public class Text
extends AbstractWireframeElement
    A Text element represents a block of canned text in a wireframe. It can be aligned but not edited otherwise.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Text(Location location)
      Creates a Text element at specified location with default alignment LEFT.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      (package private) Enums.Alignment getAlignment()
      Returns the alignment of this Text's text.
      (package private) java.lang.String getText()
      Returns the canned text of this Text.
      (package private) void setAlignment(Enums.Alignment alignment)
      Aligns this Text's text.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
